alerts.msg: Monthly revenue declined for 3rd consecutive month
Cash runway fell below 90-day safety threshold

timeline.label: Business launched. First revenue ₹1.8L/mo
timeline.description: Zara Bakeries opens in Bengaluru. Early traction with local orders and one catering contract.

timeline.label: Second month revenue grows to ₹2.1L
timeline.description: Word-of-mouth driving new customers. Gross margin healthy at 48%.

timeline.label: First corporate catering contract signed
timeline.description: Secured monthly catering contract worth ₹45,000. Revenue now ₹2.5L/mo.

timeline.label: Revenue ₹2.9L. Cash runway 160 days
timeline.description: Strong summer season. Online orders growing 12% week-on-week.

timeline.label: Hired first full-time delivery staff
timeline.description: Team grows to 5. Burn rate at healthy 0.72x. Sustainable hiring.

timeline.label: Revenue grows to ₹3.2L/mo
timeline.description: Six months in. Revenue up 78% from launch. Business fundamentals strong.

timeline.label: New product line launched. Margins stable
timeline.description: Premium cake range added. Gross margin maintained at 45%.

timeline.label: Revenue ₹3.6L. Second catering contract
timeline.description: Business growing steadily. Churn rate low at 3%. Customer retention strong.

timeline.label: Team grows to 8. Revenue ₹3.9L/mo
timeline.description: Hired 3 more staff to handle order volume. Burn rate 0.81x. Still healthy.

timeline.label: Festival season boost. Revenue ₹4.4L
timeline.description: Diwali orders drive best month yet. Cash runway extended to 172 days.

timeline.label: Post-festival normalisation. Revenue ₹3.8L
timeline.description: Expected seasonal dip. Fundamentals remain healthy. Score stable.

timeline.label: Year 1 complete. Score 20. All systems healthy
timeline.description: First full year closed. Revenue grew from ₹1.8L to ₹4.1L/mo. Gross margin 44%. Cash runway 165 days. Business is healthy.

timeline.label: Year 2 begins. Revenue ₹4.0L. Score 22
timeline.description: Post-holiday slowdown. Expected. No alarm signals yet.

timeline.label: Ingredient costs rise 12%. Margin pressure begins
timeline.description: Wheat and dairy prices up. Gross margin slips from 44% to 38%. Leadership does not adjust pricing.

timeline.label: New competitor opens nearby. Churn ticks up
timeline.description: Competing bakery opens 800 metres away. Monthly churn rises from 3% to 6%.

timeline.label: Gross margin dips below 35%
timeline.description: Cost increases not passed to customers. Margin now 33%. FailGuard flags this. Leadership ignores.

timeline.label: Revenue growth slows to +1.8% MoM
timeline.description: Growth nearly flat. Competitor is absorbing new customers. Existing customer retention weakening.

timeline.label: Churn rate crosses 8%. Cash runway 142 days
timeline.description: Customer base slowly eroding. Revenue still positive but deceleration clear.

timeline.label: Revenue growth turns flat: +0.3% MoM
timeline.description: Effectively zero growth. Combined effect of competition and margin pressure now visible.

timeline.label: Revenue turns negative: -2.1% MoM
timeline.description: First month of revenue decline. Burn rate creeping up to 0.98x. Almost spending what is earned.

timeline.label: Leadership decides to respond. Plans hiring + discount
timeline.description: Owner decides to hire 2 more staff and launch a 20% discount campaign to win back customers. Decision not yet executed.

timeline.label: ROOT CAUSE: Hired 2 staff + launched 20% discount
timeline.description: Two new hires added ₹72,000/mo to fixed payroll. 20% discount campaign reduced per-order margin from 33% to 14%. Monthly burn jumped from ₹3.1L to ₹5.09L overnight. This single compounded decision is the origin of the collapse.

timeline.label: Burn rate hits 1.18x revenue. First critical alert
timeline.description: Spending more than earning for the first time. Cash runway drops from 142 to 101 days in 3 weeks.

timeline.label: Year 2 close. Score 65. Business in trouble
timeline.description: Year ended with burn rate 1.22x, churn 11%, revenue -5.4% MoM. Cash runway 89 days. The discount did not win back customers — it just burned cash.

timeline.label: New year. Old problems. Score 66
timeline.description: Discount campaign ended but damage done. Customers who returned on discount are now churning again at full price.

timeline.label: Revenue decline accelerates: -6.8% MoM
timeline.description: Three consecutive months of revenue decline. Burn rate 1.28x. Cash runway 82 days.

timeline.label: Cash runway crosses below 90-day threshold
timeline.description: Cash runway now 79 days — below the 90-day safety threshold. FailGuard issues CRITICAL alert. Owner still not aware of full picture.

timeline.label: Churn rate hits 12%. Customer base eroding fast
timeline.description: 12% of remaining customers left this month. Combined with revenue decline, the business is now in accelerating deterioration.

timeline.label: Burn rate hits 1.3x. Gross margin 29%
timeline.description: Every month the business operates it loses ground. Gross margin now 29%, down from 44% at peak.

timeline.label: Revenue -8.1% MoM. Staff morale declining
timeline.description: Third year of operation but revenue is now lower than Month 4 of Year 1. Structural decline confirmed.

timeline.label: Cash runway 71 days. Burn 1.32x revenue
timeline.description: Running out of time. Without intervention the business has roughly 10 weeks before it cannot meet payroll.

timeline.label: Current state. Score 74. DANGER. 67 days cash left
timeline.description: This is today. Five indicators in the danger zone simultaneously. Cash runway 67 days. Burn rate 1.34x. Revenue -8.2% MoM. Churn 14%. Gross margin 28%. Intervention required immediately.

datasetSummary.keyInsight: Root cause occurred 14 months before reaching DANGER. Existing tools detected nothing during this window. FailGuard flagged it on day one.
